description: System call monitoring involves tracking and analyzing the system calls made by applications to ensure security and compliance. This is particularly important when dealing with untrusted third-party libraries or containerized applications.
you_have_this_if: You are running applications in containers.
You suspect malicious behavior from third-party libraries.
You need to ensure compliance with security policies.
You require real-time insights into application behavior.
You are facing performance issues related to system calls.

approaches.best_for: when you need to monitor system calls from untrusted third-party libraries in a container.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Provides real-time monitoring but may introduce overhead in performance.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to ensure security and compliance in a production environment with real-time monitoring.

start_here: The recommended first approach is to use the System Call Analyzer, as it provides a comprehensive solution for monitoring system calls in containerized applications while ensuring security and compliance.
